SELECT c.class_code, c.class_name, c.class_thumnail, c.class_hashtag, c.class_price, c2.code_value AS big_category, c3.code_value AS small_category, m.member_nickname, m.member_img, c22.code_value AS local_name FROM ( SELECT p.class_code, COUNT(*) AS count FROM pay p JOIN class c ON p.class_code = c.class_code WHERE c.class_active = 'Y' AND c.class_regist_status = '2' AND c.class_hide = '1' GROUP BY p.class_code ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10 ) AS top_classes JOIN class c ON c.class_code = top_classes.class_code JOIN common2 c2 ON c.class_big_category = c2.common2_code AND c2.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN common3 c3 ON c.class_small_category = c3.common3_code AND c3.common2_code = c2.common2_code AND c3.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN MEMBER m ON c.member_code = m.member_code JOIN common2 c22 ON c.common2_code = c22.common2_code AND c22.common1_code = 'LC';

SELECT c.class_code, c.class_name, c.class_thumnail, c.class_hashtag, c.class_price, c2.code_value AS big_category, c3.code_value AS small_category, m.member_nickname, m.member_img, c22.code_value AS local_name FROM class c JOIN common2 c2 ON c.class_big_category = c2.common2_code AND c2.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN common3 c3 ON c.class_small_category = c3.common3_code AND c3.common2_code = c2.common2_code AND c3.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN MEMBER m ON c.member_code = m.member_code JOIN common2 c22 ON c.common2_code = c22.common2_code AND c22.common1_code = 'LC' WHERE c.class_active = 'Y' AND c.class_regist_status = '2' AND c.class_hide = '1' ORDER BY class_code DESC LIMIT 8;

SELECT c.class_code ,class_name ,c2.code_value AS class_big_category ,c3.code_value AS class_small_category ,lc.code_value AS local_name ,c2.common2_code ,c3.common3_code ,class_thumnail ,class_image ,class_ex ,class_location ,class_creator_explain ,class_hide ,class_price ,class_map_x ,class_map_y ,class_hashtag ,m.member_nickname ,m.member_img FROM class c JOIN common2 c2 ON c.class_big_category = c2.common2_code AND c2.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN common3 c3 ON c.class_small_category = c3.common3_code AND c3.common2_code = c2.common2_code AND c3.common1_code = 'CLC' JOIN MEMBER m ON c.member_code = m.member_code JOIN common2 lc ON c.common2_code = lc.common2_code AND lc.common1_code = 'LC' WHERE (c.class_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.class_ex LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.class_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.class_hashtag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c2.code_value LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c3.code_value LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND c.class_active = 'Y' AND c.class_regist_status = '2' AND c.class_hide = '1';

SELECT search_word_keyword FROM ( SELECT search_word_keyword, COUNT(*) AS keyword_count FROM search_word WHERE search_word_keyword REGEXP '^[가-힣]+$' GROUP BY search_word_keyword ) AS subquery ORDER BY keyword_count DESC LIMIT 7;
